title: Veggana
description: This vegan restaurant, opened Mar 2015, features a deli counter and offers a daytime set menu as well an evening one. Casual, seats 50. Sample menu items such as salads, dips like hummus and guacamole, veg burgers made from lentils and chickpeas, and also vegan desserts. The animal rights posters which adorn the walls are available for 1 euro with proceeds going to farm animal sanctuaries. Catalan, Spanish, and English spoken.
